fields.headline: Pick of the week: Exhibitions
fields.bodyText: Pipilotti Rist Picturehouse At FACT, Liverpool Video art that is delightfully poignant, and as deep as it is great fun — Rist seduces the viewer into secret and wonderful intimacies, as she examines human nature. Isamu Noguchi Yorkshire Sculpture Park, Wakefield Noguchi conjures forms of transcendental grace from massive blocks of granite and basalt. Some 60 years of abstract sculptural enchantments. Gustav Klimt Tate Liverpool The blockbuster show for Liverpool's European City of Culture year. Klimt's sensuous painting remains irresistible a century after it first shocked and enchanted. Vivienne Westwood Millennium Galleries, Sheffield "I do believe appearances are everything." Emerging from the punk backstreets to the celebrity catwalk, Westwood still delights with her design mischief. Neverland The Whitworth Art Gallery, Manchester An intriguing show of work by artists who jettisoned predictable skills to achieve the expressive audacity of children's art. Includes Klee and Dubuffet.
